event.title: lost their first child, Hailey, in May 2006

data.event: The couple lost their first child, Hailey, in May 2006 just 15 minutes after she was born during Kristina’s 26th week of pregnancy.
Two miscarriages followed before Annika was born June 13.

event.title: March of Dimes, it will be held

data.event: A fundraiser for the March of Dimes, it will be held April 25 in Hopkins Park in DeKalb.

event.title: are born premature annually in the country, according to March

data.event: An estimated half-million babies are born premature annually in the country, according to March of Dimes.

event.title: led to Annika’s birth last year
